quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
together: "It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company." --Amy Morin

quote: If you are lonely when you're alone, you are in bad company.
together: "If you are lonely when you're alone, you are in bad company." --Jamais Cascio

quote: The strongest man in the world is he who stands most alone.
together: "The strongest man in the world is he who stands most alone." --Jennifer Hyman

quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
together: "Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better." --Joshua Waitzkin

quote: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
together: "The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself." --Amy Morin

quote: Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is the richness of self.
together: "Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is the richness of self." --Gever Tulley

quote: You come into the world alone and you go out of the world alone yet it seems to me you are more alone while living than even going and coming.
together: "You come into the world alone and you go out of the world alone yet it seems to me you are more alone while living than even going and coming." --Albert Bandura

quote: If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone.
together: "If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone." --Jean Chatzky

quote: Every man is born as many men and dies as a single one.
together: "Every man is born as many men and dies as a single one." --Sheri L. Dew

quote: Solitude vivifies; isolation kills.
together: "Solitude vivifies; isolation kills." --Eric Greitens

quote: All men's miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone.
together: "All men's miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone." --Eric Greitens

quote: Let your mind alone, and see what happens.
together: "Let your mind alone, and see what happens." --Kevin Rudd

quote: As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone.
together: "As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone." --Karren Brady

quote: I restore myself when I'm alone.
together: "I restore myself when I'm alone." --Phil Klay

quote: The longer one is alone, the easier it is to hear the song of the earth.
together: "The longer one is alone, the easier it is to hear the song of the earth." --Elizabeth Edwards

quote: A man is born alone and dies alone; and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone; and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode.
together: "A man is born alone and dies alone; and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone; and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode." --Brooke Shields

quote: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
together: "What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be." --Joan Halifax

quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
together: "You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with." --Naomi Wolf

quote: It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone - so far.
together: "It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone - so far." --Maria Konnikova

quote: I never said, 'I want to be alone.' I only said, 'I want to be left alone.' There is all the difference.
together: "I never said, 'I want to be alone.' I only said, 'I want to be left alone.' There is all the difference." --Arianna Huffington

quote: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
together: "Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me." --Patti Davis

quote: We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life.
together: "We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life." --Elizabeth Edwards

quote: To live alone is the fate of all great souls.
together: "To live alone is the fate of all great souls." --Eddie the Eagle

quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
together: "When everything is lonely I can be my best friend." --Sal Khan

quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
together: "Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much." --A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
together: "Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work." --Jeff Bezos

quote: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.
together: "In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself." --Michael Greger

quote: It is better to be alone than in bad company.
together: "It is better to be alone than in bad company." --Sylvia Earle

quote: Yes, I guess you could say I am a loner, but I feel more lonely in a crowed room with boring people than I feel on my own.
together: "Yes, I guess you could say I am a loner, but I feel more lonely in a crowed room with boring people than I feel on my own." --Elie Wiesel

quote: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
together: "To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude." --Steve Aoki

quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
together: "The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want." --Chamath Palihapitiya

quote: If you're going to put yourself above everybody else, you might end up alone.
together: "If you're going to put yourself above everybody else, you might end up alone." --Laura Lippman

quote: When the people you love are gone, you're alone.
together: "When the people you love are gone, you're alone." --Muhammad Yunus

quote: I have so many different personalities in me and I still feel lonely.
together: "I have so many different personalities in me and I still feel lonely." --Andre Leon Talley

quote: Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation; for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
together: "Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation; for it is better to be alone than in bad company." --Paul Dini

quote: To be adult is to be alone.
together: "To be adult is to be alone." --Janette Turner Hospital

quote: Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for.
together: "Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for." --Cathy Engelbert

quote: The eternal quest of the individual human being is to shatter his loneliness.
together: "The eternal quest of the individual human being is to shatter his loneliness." --Peter Maurer

quote: I would rather be a beggar and single than a queen and married.
together: "I would rather be a beggar and single than a queen and married." --Coretta Scott King

quote: Inside myself is a place where I live all alone and that is where I renew my springs that never dry up.
together: "Inside myself is a place where I live all alone and that is where I renew my springs that never dry up." --Frans van Houten

quote: Living alone makes it harder to find someone to blame.
together: "Living alone makes it harder to find someone to blame." --Dave Pelzer

quote: I only go out to get me a fresh appetite for being alone.
together: "I only go out to get me a fresh appetite for being alone." --Claire Fox

quote: Every man must do two things alone; he must do his own believing and his own dying.
together: "Every man must do two things alone; he must do his own believing and his own dying." --Jennifer Egan

quote: Moon! Moon! I am prone before you. Pity me, and drench me in loneliness.
together: "Moon! Moon! I am prone before you. Pity me, and drench me in loneliness." --Gita Gopinath

quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone, and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom, for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.
together: "A man can be himself only so long as he is alone, and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom, for it is only when he is alone that he is really free." --Jane McGonigal

quote: Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone.
together: "Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone." --Daphne Oz

quote: There's a tremendous difference between alone and lonely. You could be lonely in a group of people. I like being alone. I like eating by myself. I go home at night and just watch a movie or hang out with my dog. I have to exert myself and really say, oh God, I've got to see my friends 'cause I'm too content being by myself.
together: "There's a tremendous difference between alone and lonely. You could be lonely in a group of people. I like being alone. I like eating by myself. I go home at night and just watch a movie or hang out with my dog. I have to exert myself and really say, oh God, I've got to see my friends 'cause I'm too content being by myself." --Sheryl Sandberg

quote: Then stirs the feeling infinite, so felt In solitude, where we are least alone.
together: "Then stirs the feeling infinite, so felt In solitude, where we are least alone." --Arianna Huffington

quote: When so many are lonely as seem to be lonely, it would be inexcusably selfish to be lonely alone.
together: "When so many are lonely as seem to be lonely, it would be inexcusably selfish to be lonely alone." --Brad Henry

quote: You're only lonely if you're not there for you.
together: "You're only lonely if you're not there for you." --Brad Henry

quote: Nothing makes us so lonely as our secrets.
together: "Nothing makes us so lonely as our secrets." --Troy Carter

quote: You only grow when you are alone.
together: "You only grow when you are alone." --Patrisse Cullors

quote: Solitude is independence.
together: "Solitude is independence." --Steven Pressfield

quote: I may climb perhaps to no great heights, but I will climb alone.
together: "I may climb perhaps to no great heights, but I will climb alone." --Angie Thomas

quote: All men's misfortunes spring from their hatred of being alone.
together: "All men's misfortunes spring from their hatred of being alone." --Ertharin Cousin

quote: Don't go away. I don't want to be alone. I can't stand being alone.
together: "Don't go away. I don't want to be alone. I can't stand being alone." --Liz Truss

quote: Solitude is the profoundest fact of the human condition. Man is the only being who knows he is alone.
together: "Solitude is the profoundest fact of the human condition. Man is the only being who knows he is alone." --Jeannie Mai

quote: The lonely become either thoughtful or empty.
together: "The lonely become either thoughtful or empty." --Clemantine Wamariya

quote: I finally faced the fact that it isn't a crime not having friends. Being alone means you have fewer problems.
together: "I finally faced the fact that it isn't a crime not having friends. Being alone means you have fewer problems." --Alan K. Simpson

quote: He never is alone that is accompanied with noble thoughts.
together: "He never is alone that is accompanied with noble thoughts." --Patrisse Cullors
